## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change that fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change that adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Infrastructure/CI (changes to `.github/workflows/`, `Makefile`, branch protection, etc.)
- [ ] Documentation update

## Infrastructure/CI Changes Only

**MANDATORY if you checked Infrastructure/CI above**

- [ ] **Assumption tested**: I verified my core assumption works (not just "should work")
- [ ] **Simple first**: I tried the boring, Stack Overflow solution first
- [ ] **Blast radius**: If this breaks, impact is: _____
- [ ] **Rollback plan**: To revert this: _____

**What assumption did you test and how?**
_Example: "Tested that GitHub Ruleset patterns match branch names by creating test branch `Sources/test`"_

**What's the boring alternative you considered?**
_Example: "Just use a PAT instead of complex rulesets"_

## Checklist
- [ ] I have tested my changes locally
- [ ] I have run `make check` and all checks pass
- [ ] I have run `make test` and all tests pass
- [ ] I have updated documentation if needed
- [ ] My code follows the project's coding style
- [ ] CI checks will pass (not using `--admin` to bypass)
